name: Mega Man Zero
overview: It's your mission to help the exiled scientist Ciel discover the source of a new reploid energy! Play as Mega Man's pal Zero, the reploid from the Mega Man X series turned good by the infectious Sigma Virus and 100 years of sleep. Conquer your adversaries and find the energy source... or risk ultimate defeat. It's up to you to defend good from the destructive powers in the universe. • A classic adventure starring Mega Man's pal Zero • The most challenging Mega Man game yet! • 70 helpful Cyber-Elves to collect • Special data recording ability entitles top ranked players to bragging rights
